official_title: To authorize the sale of certain National Forest System lands in the Superior National Forest in Minnesota.
short_title: Superior National Forest Land Adjustment Act of 2007

summary.text: Superior National Forest Land Adjustment Act of 2007 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to sell certain lands in Superior National Forest in Minnesota. Requires: (1) consideration for a sale of lands to be not less than the appraised market value of those lands; and (2) the first offer for the sale of the lands under this Act to be made to Poly Met Mining, Inc.

titles.title: Superior National Forest Land Adjustment Act of 2007
To authorize the sale of certain National Forest System lands in the Superior National Forest in Minnesota.
